content:
On http://cql.hl7.org/history.html the link for Normative Sequence for v1.5.1 points to http://cql.hl7.org/N1 but that link is broken

On http://cql.hl7.org/grammar.html the link for Raw CQL Grammar points to http://cql.hl7.org/cql/cql.g4 which is broken, and the link for Raw FHIRPath Grammar (about 80% down the page) points to http://cql.hl7.org/cql/fhirpath.g4 which is also broken
The issue with the /N1 directory is a website problem, hopefully that will be addressed as part of this errata publication.
